Module chessclock
Package chessclock

Class PlayerData

java.lang.Object
chessclock.PlayerData
public final class PlayerData extends Object
A complete list of a player's data required for a game. Essentially, that's as you can adjust in the game settings panel.
Since:
1.0;

  • Method Details

    • makeNew

      public static Optional<PlayerData> makeNew(String name, Country country, time.TimeControlPhase[] timeControlPhases, boolean phasesAdditive, long moveTimeLimit, long warningThreshold)
      Creates a new set of player data.
      Parameters:
      name - Player's name.
      country - Player's country.
      timeControlPhases - List of time control phases.
      phasesAdditive - Are time control phases additive (true)? Or are they destructive (false)?
      moveTimeLimit - Time limit per move in nanoseconds.
      warningThreshold - Threshold for the visual short-on-time-warning in nanoseconds.
      Returns:
      The player data or an empty optional in case you pass useless arguments.
      Since:
      1.0;
